steps.text: Heat a kadhai over high flame; add salt and heat up the salt. Keep stirring the salt with a perforated spoon.
Once the salt is hot enough, lower the flame to medium and add the cashewnuts.
Start stirring continuously for 1 minute. The cashewnuts will turn light golden.
Remove them using a slotted spoon and transfer them in a large plate. Allow the roasted salted cashewnuts to cool down completely.
Once they come to room temperature, mix it with your hands, to get rid of the excess salt.
Serve the salted cashewnuts as is or you can gift them on special occasion to your loved ones.

author: Yaman Agarwal

recipeIntros.text:
Hey Foodies,
If you are craving for something sweet and salty, and you are a fan of cashews! Then this is the recipe for you. Let’s make these utterly delicious, lightly salted cashews at home. All you need is salt and cashews, toss them and roast them in a pan, until light golden brown. You can make these sweet and salty cashews in just a few minutes with simple ingredients this is a no-fuss recipe. Deliciously simple and amazing indulgent.

Notes:
You can use the same salt, again to roast other nuts.
Stirring continuously is the key to a good roasted cashewnuts.
